meta.description: Party state tracking for current companions and cohesion
meta.notes: Track active companions, party cohesion clock, and morale

companion_notes.notes: Add companion-specific notes here as they join/leave

party_cohesion_clock.note: Ticks up with successful cooperation, ticks down with conflict. At 0, risk of party split. At max, party gains +1 to teamwork invoking.

morale.note: Affects willingness to take risks and face challenges

party_alignment.note: Positive numbers indicate lean toward that faction. Range: -10 to +10

party_goals.primary: Survive the civil war and shape Skyrim's future
